cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsumi

sentence.kanji: 彼の罪は重いな。
sentence.romaji: kare no tsumi ha omoi na
sentence.english: His crime is serious.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuukan

sentence.kanji: そのふたつの町の中間には川が流れているの。
sentence.romaji: sono futatsu no machi no chuukan ni ha kawa ga nagarete iru no
sentence.english: A river flows between the two towns.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seken

sentence.kanji: 世間の反応は冷たかったよ。
sentence.romaji: seken no hannou ha tsumetakata yo
sentence.english: The reaction of the public was cold.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisei

sentence.kanji: 今日は快晴ですね。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha kaisei desu ne
sentence.english: Today's weather is fine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eisei

sentence.kanji: 衛星が打ち上げられましたね。
sentence.romaji: eisei ga uchiageraremashita ne
sentence.english: The satellite was launched.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eiseiteki

sentence.kanji: このレストランは衛生的で安心です。
sentence.romaji: kono resutoran ha eiseiteki de anshin desu
sentence.english: This restaurant is clean and safe.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ma

sentence.kanji: 彼は少し間を置いてから返事した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sukoshi ma wo oite kara henji shita
sentence.english: He responded after a short pause.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kimari

sentence.kanji: 決まりを守ることは大切です。
sentence.romaji: kimari wo mamoru koto ha taisetsu desu
sentence.english: It is important to keep the rules.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mondou

sentence.kanji: あなたと問答している暇はないの。
sentence.romaji: anata to mondou shite iru hima ha nai no
sentence.english: I have no time to argue with you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakan

sentence.kanji: 夜間は裏口から入ってください。
sentence.romaji: yakan ha uraguchi kara haite kudasai
sentence.english: Please enter from the back door at night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eisei

sentence.kanji: 衛生には十分気を付けましょう。
sentence.romaji: eisei ni ha juubun ki wo tsukemashou
sentence.english: Let's take proper care of hygiene.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakama

sentence.kanji: 彼には仲間がたくさんいる。
sentence.romaji: kare ni ha nakama ga takusan iru
sentence.english: He has a lot of peers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houmon

sentence.kanji: 来週、妻の実家を訪問します。
sentence.romaji: raishuu tsuma no jika wo houmon shimasu
sentence.english: Next week we'll visit my wife's family home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tou

sentence.kanji: 応募者の年齢は問いません。
sentence.romaji: oubosha no nenrei ha toimasen
sentence.english: Applicants of all ages are accepted.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kankaku

sentence.kanji: 電車は5分間隔で来ますよ。
sentence.romaji: densha ha gofun kankaku de kimasu yo
sentence.english: The train comes every five minutes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gimon

sentence.kanji: 彼の言葉が本当かは疑問です。
sentence.romaji: kare no kotoba ga hontou ka ha gimon desu
sentence.english: I doubt whether what he says is true.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaihou

sentence.kanji: その国は市場の開放を求められているの。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni ha shijou no kaihou wo motomerarete iru no
sentence.english: That country has been requested to open its markets.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jikanwari

sentence.kanji: 明日の授業は時間割り通りです。
sentence.romaji: ashita no jugyou ha jikanwari doori desu
sentence.english: Tomorrow's class is as noted on the time table.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senmonka

sentence.kanji: 教授はフランス文学の専門家。
sentence.romaji: kyouju ha furansu bungaku no senmonka
sentence.english: The professor is a specialist of French literature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenkou

sentence.kanji: ここは天候の変化が激しいですね。
sentence.romaji: koko ha tenkou no henka ga hageshii desu ne
sentence.english: The climate here is very changeable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuukan

sentence.kanji: 狭い空間に物がたくさん置いてあるね。
sentence.romaji: semai kuukan ni mono ga takusan oite aru ne
sentence.english: A lot of things have been put into a tight space.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jieitai

sentence.kanji: 自衛隊がイラクに派遣されたわ。
sentence.romaji: jieitai ga iraku ni haken sareta wa
sentence.english: The Self Defense Forces were sent to Iraq.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanashimi

sentence.kanji: 突然の悲しみが一家を襲いました。
sentence.romaji: totsuzen no kanashimi ga ika wo osoimashita
sentence.english: Sudden grief fell upon the whole family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bouei

sentence.kanji: チャンピオンがタイトルを防衛した。
sentence.romaji: chanpion ga taitoru wo bouei shita
sentence.english: The champion defended the title.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's idai

sentence.kanji: 彼は偉大な事業をなしとげました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha idai na jigyou wo nashitoge mashita
sentence.english: He accomplished a great project.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nikan

sentence.kanji: 日韓合同のコンサートが開かれたよ。
sentence.romaji: nikan goudou no konsa-to ga hirakareta yo
sentence.english: There was a joint concert with Japan and South Korea.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tonya

sentence.kanji: この街には家具の問屋がたくさんあります。
sentence.romaji: kono machi ni ha kagu no tonya ga takusan arimasu
sentence.english: There are a lot of wholesale furniture stores in this town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ima

sentence.kanji: 父は居間でテレビを見ている。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha ima de terebi wo mite iru
sentence.english: My father is watching TV in the living room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kan

sentence.kanji: その間に彼は居なくなっていました。
sentence.romaji: sono kan ni kare ha inaku nate imashita
sentence.english: He disappeared in the meantime.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tobira

sentence.kanji: 彼は扉を開けたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tobira wo aketa n da
sentence.english: He opened the door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokoroyoi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は快い眠りについています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kokoroyoi nemuri ni tsuite imasu
sentence.english: She is sleeping soundly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's michigaeru

sentence.kanji: 掃除をしたら部屋が見違えるようになったの。
sentence.romaji: souji wo shitara heya ga michigaeru you ni nata no
sentence.english: I began to see the room differently as I cleaned it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haiku

sentence.kanji: 「さくら」という言葉を使って俳句を書いたよ。
sentence.romaji: 「sakura」 toiu kotoba wo tsukate haiku wo kaita yo
sentence.english: I composed a haiku poem using the word "sakura."

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haiyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は俳優です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha haiyuu desu
sentence.english: He's an actor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuumon

sentence.kanji: 私は相撲部屋に入門しました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sumou beya ni nyuumon shimashita
sentence.english: I entered a sumo stable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hinan

sentence.kanji: 国民は総理大臣を非難しているね。
sentence.romaji: kokumin ha souri daijin wo hinan shite iru ne
sentence.english: The people are criticizing the Prime Minister.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naikaku

sentence.kanji: 新しい内閣が誕生したね。
sentence.romaji: atarashii naikaku ga tanjou shita ne
sentence.english: A new Cabinet was formed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatakau

sentence.kanji: 彼は病気と闘ったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha byouki to tatakata no
sentence.english: He battled against his illness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuyukai

sentence.kanji: 彼の話を聞いて不愉快になった。
sentence.romaji: kare no hanashi wo kiite fuyukai ni nata
sentence.english: I got upset listening to his story.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yukai

sentence.kanji: 彼らはとても愉快な人たちです。
sentence.romaji: karera ha totemo yukai na hitotachi desu
sentence.english: They're very pleasant people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keshou

sentence.kanji: 僕たちは頑張って決勝まで進んだよ。
sentence.romaji: bokutachi ha ganbate keshou made susunda yo
sentence.english: We tried hard and advanced to the finals.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakumon

sentence.kanji: 彼は少年の頃から学問が好きでした。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shounen no koro kara gakumon ga suki deshita
sentence.english: He liked to learn ever since he was a little boy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's souko

sentence.kanji: この荷物を倉庫に運びましょう。
sentence.romaji: kono nimotsu wo souko ni hakobimashou
sentence.english: Let's carry this luggage to the warehouse.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's souritsu

sentence.kanji: この学校は1962年に創立されました。
sentence.romaji: kono gakou ha 1962 nen ni souritsu saremashita
sentence.english: This school was established in 1962.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouhai

sentence.kanji: 彼は大学の後輩です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha daigaku no kouhai desu
sentence.english: He's my junior in college.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senpai

sentence.kanji: 日本人は先輩、後輩の関係をとても大切に考えます。
sentence.romaji: niponjin ha senpai kouhai no kankei wo totemo taisetsu ni kangaemasu
sentence.english: Japanese people value the relationship between seniors and juniors.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hirakeru

sentence.kanji: 霧が晴れて視界が開けたね。
sentence.romaji: kiri ga harete shikai ga hiraketa ne
sentence.english: The fog has cleared up and visibility has increased.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keikai

sentence.kanji: 彼らは軽快なステップで踊り出したの。
sentence.romaji: karera ha keikai na sutepu de odoridashita no
sentence.english: They began to dance with jaunty steps.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ketsui

sentence.kanji: 彼の決意は堅いな。
sentence.romaji: kare no ketsui ha katai na
sentence.english: His decision is firm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shunkan

sentence.kanji: その瞬間、猫が跳び出しました。
sentence.romaji: sono shunkan neko ga tobidashimashita
sentence.english: At that instant, the cat ran out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ran

sentence.kanji: お名前は上の欄にお書きください。
sentence.romaji: o namae ha ue no ran ni o kaki kudasai
sentence.english: Please write your name in the top box.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uramon

sentence.kanji: 奴は裏門から出てきたぜ。
sentence.romaji: yatsu ha uramon kara dete kita ze
sentence.english: He came out from the back gate.
